mapper.select: /** AccountMapper.getBarcodeSeq */ VALUES NEXT VALUE FOR MEMBERSHIP.BARCODE_SEQ
mapper.insert: /** MyMembershipMapper.save */ INSERT INTO TB_MY_MEMBERSHIP VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{mspId}, #{status}, #{totalAccumPoint}, #{mspGradeCd}, NOW(), NULL, #{barCd} )
mapper.select: /** MyMembershipMapper.findDetailByBarCdAndFranchiseeId */ SELECT A.* , B.MSP_ID AS FRCHS_MSP_ID , B.FRANCHISEE_ID AS FRCHS_FRANCHISEE_ID , B.FRANCHISEE_NM AS FRCHS_FRANCHISEE_NM , B.STATUS AS FRCHS_STATUS , B.ZIP_CD AS FRCHS_ZIP_CD , B.ADDR1 AS FRCHS_ADDR1 , B.ADDR2 AS FRCHS_ADDR2 , B.TEL_NO AS FRCHS_TEL_NO , B.BIGO AS FRCHS_BIGO , C.MSP_ID AS GRADE_MSP_ID , C.MSP_GRADE_CD AS GRADE_MSP_GRADE_CD , C.GRADE_UP_POINT_FR AS GRADE_UP_POINT_FR , C.GRADE_UP_POINT_TO AS GRADE_UP_POINT_TO , C.ACCUM_RAT AS GRADE_ACCUM_RAT , C.DISC_RAT AS GRADE_DISC_RAT , D.MSP_ID AS M_MSP_ID , D.MSP_NM AS M_MSP_NM , D.STATUS AS M_STATUS , D.MSP_INFO AS M_MSP_INFO , D.MSP_IMG_URL AS M_MSP_IMG_URL , D.HOMEPAGE_URL AS M_HOMEPAGE_URL , D.ACTIVE_MONTHS AS M_ACTIVE_MONTHS , D.BIGO AS M_BIGO FROM TB_MY_MEMBERSHIP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBERSHIP_FRANCHISEE B ON B.MSP_ID = A.MSP_ID AND B.FRANCHISEE_ID = #{franchiseeId} LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBERSHIP_GRADE C ON C.MSP_ID = A.MSP_ID AND C.MSP_GRADE_CD = A.MSP_GRADE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBERSHIP D ON D.MSP_ID = A.MSP_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.BAR_CD = #{barCd}
mapper.insert: /** MyMembershipMapper.saveAccumHis */ INSERT INTO TB_MY_MEMBERSHIP_ACCUM_HIS VALUES ( #{cancelBarCd}, #{status}, #{accountId}, #{mspId}, #{franchiseeId}, #{tradeAmt}, #{mspGradeCd}, #{accumRat}, #{accumPoint}, #{expireYmd}, NOW(), NULL )
